Package org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler

Class PersistedScheduler

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler.PersistedScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scheduler
public class PersistedScheduler extends Object
Creates a scheduler that is persisted to the OpenIDM repo.

      public void addJob(org.quartz.JobDetail job, boolean replace) throws org.quartz.SchedulerException

      Specified by:

    • getCurrentlyExecutingJobs

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getCurrentlyExecutingJobs() throws org.quartz.SchedulerException, IOException
      Description copied from interface: Scheduler
      Gets the currently executing jobs. Note that this method is not cluster aware and will only return the running jobs for the instance this method was invoked on.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      a JsonValue list of the currently executing jobs
      Throws:
